entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:22 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 2:00 PM CDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -9

Wind: N 8 km/h

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
